document_data.name: Augment Psionics
document_data.mainbody: '''''Augment psionics''''' was a [[spell]] used by [[cleric]]s of [[Deep Duerra]].
document_data.Effects: When cast, this spell increased the [[psionic]] abilities of the caster or targeted creature. If cast on a creature with no psionic abilities, the spell had no effect.
document_data.Components: In addition to [[verbal]] and [[somatic]] components, this spell required a [[material component]], the holy symbol of Deep Duerra.
